title: Crazy lag spikes

replies.body:
Do you still have these latency issues if you bypass your wireless connection and try a wired (ethernet) connection directly to your modem? While WiFi is convenient, it often fails to provide a stable connection. Our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) goes over some additional steps that I feel would benefit your connection and potentially resolve your issue.

Let me know if you continue to have problems after working through those steps.

Sorry for late response, I went to bed soon after I posted this and almost forgot about it, but I can't set up ethernet at the moment because the modem won't give me any internet. But I really don't think that's the problem, when the lag only starts when there is a lot of abilities, spells, etc happening. It can't be using much internet to load the actions. I think it may have to do with packet loss, maybe the actions that me and other people are doing don't go back to me (Not really sure how it works).

When you have some time, I definitely recommend working through that connection guide to see if anything changes. Additionally, if you're able to get that wired connection to work, you'll be taking a huge step in seeing if your WiFi is the culprit.
